experientialCompetencies.name: Purposeful Engagement
experientialCompetencies.description: Active, intentional participation in authentic professional work. Students demonstrate initiative, persistence through ambiguity, and adaptive response to feedback.

experientialCompetencies.name: Reflective Practice
experientialCompetencies.description: Systematic processing of experience to extract meaning. Students develop the capacity to accurately describe their actions, critically examine their assumptions, and honestly assess their own performance.

experientialCompetencies.name: Integrative Learning
experientialCompetencies.description: Connecting experiential learning to prior knowledge, theory, and coursework. Students make explicit connections between what they're doing and what they've learned academically.

experientialCompetencies.name: Transfer Capacity
experientialCompetencies.description: Articulating how learning applies to future contexts. The goal is developing capabilities that transfer to future academic, professional, and personal situations.

naceCompetencies.name: Critical Thinking
naceCompetencies.description: Identify and respond to needs based on situational context and logical analysis

naceCompetencies.name: Communication
naceCompetencies.description: Clearly and effectively exchange information, ideas, and perspectives

naceCompetencies.name: Teamwork
naceCompetencies.description: Build and maintain collaborative relationships toward common goals

naceCompetencies.name: Professionalism
naceCompetencies.description: Understand and demonstrate effective work habits across contexts

naceCompetencies.name: Technology
naceCompetencies.description: Understand and leverage technologies ethically to enhance outcomes

naceCompetencies.name: Leadership
naceCompetencies.description: Recognize and capitalize on personal and team strengths toward goals

naceCompetencies.name: Equity & Inclusion
naceCompetencies.description: Demonstrate awareness and skills to equitably engage diverse perspectives

naceCompetencies.name: Career & Self Development
naceCompetencies.description: Proactively develop oneself through continual learning

assessmentArchitecture.name: Project Deliverables
assessmentArchitecture.description: Artifacts that demonstrate skill application and create value for the employer

assessmentArchitecture.name: Project Presentation
assessmentArchitecture.description: Opportunity to communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders

assessmentArchitecture.name: Reflections
assessmentArchitecture.description: Structured processing of experience using the DEAL model

assessmentArchitecture.name: Employer Evaluations
assessmentArchitecture.description: External validation of professional performance and contribution

kolbCycle.name: Kolb's Experiential Learning Cycle
kolbCycle.description: Every week includes activities across four phases

components.name: Describe
components.prompt: What happened? What did you do?

components.name: Examine
components.prompt: What does it mean? How does it connect to prior learning?

components.name: Articulate Learning
components.prompt: What did you learn? How will you apply it?
